casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
John Lucky ADAMS. No. 196P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2005. John Lucky Adams, Pro Se. Martin T. McCracken, Assistant Attorney General, Kenneth W. Honeycutt, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 8th day of April 2005 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th day of May 2005."
